content.html:
@ocrave, Thanks for this new feature. We've been upgrading our style a bit with the following rules:

  1. Don't prefix a member accessors with "Get". For example World::GetWind() const should be World::Wind() const. Keep using the Set prefix for mutators.

  2. Use const for all parameters that do not to change in a function. For example, Model::SetWindMode(bool _mode) should be Model::SetWindMode(const bool _mode).
